inclusion.criterion: Outpatients referred for clinically indicated angiography for assessment of CAD
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Absence of clinical contraindication to angiography
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients presenting with acute coronary syndrome
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with previously known significant CAD (any lesion >50%) or percutaneous coronary intervention or coronary artery bypass surgery
exclusion.label: unknown
